/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting long shadows on the ground, adding depth to the scene. The image is a beautiful representation of urban life in Beijing, where nature and architecture coexist harmoniously.
